website_summaries.verdict: Mid-priced model with excellent suction and handy corner brushes.
pros: This easy-to-use model makes quick work of small spaces and is easy to schedule using the Shark Clean app
XL dustbin does not need frequent emptying during cleaning
cons: This model struggles with furniture and other obstacles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for two days but, so far, I'm really disappointed. It moves in such a random pattern that 70% of the room gets vacuumed while 30% doesn't. It goes over and over and over the same areas while totally neglecting the other un-vacuumed areas. Even on a hallway, where I would expect it to travel in a straight line up and back, it just goes its zig-zag merry way. I am going to have to get my vacuum cleaner out and do all the areas this missed. I might as well just do the vacuuming myself. If it improves, I'll update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a godsend! I have a German Shepherd and a Lab mix who shed like no other. I just needed something to help me not have to vacuum every single day. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and surprisingly haven’t had to vacuum at all. Amazing!! I am so happy with my Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: A Nighttime Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A great cleaning robot. Picks up a lot of dirt and pet hair. Works best if the floors are cleared and chairs (dining room) are put up. App is buggy at times, but does what you need it to. A tad on the loud side, but nothing you couldn’t sleep through.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the switch!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this twice now and I have to say I LOVE IT! My iRobot died so I thought I’d give the cheaper comparable brand a try. This has double the size waste bin. Double corner brushes. Powerful suction. WiFi for controlling with your phone. Glad I made the switch so far. I’ll update after I’ve used it longer.
customer_reviews.author: RReliford

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Its a great vacuum and although I would love for this to last forever, I am on my 3rd. I hate vacuuming and I have long hair and and long haired dog, and this vacuum works hard. I don't need to babysit this one, it does a great job maneuvering. Nice big reservoir for dirt too.
customer_reviews.author: squeaks1111

customer_reviews.title: Probably Works Better In Open Area Rooms
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum wasn't for us. It's probably great if you have a home with wide open spaces but we have a historic home with narrow hallways & I guess we have a lot of furniture because the vacuum couldn't go two seconds without bumping into the leg of something. I mean, it was CONSTANTLY bumping into things then it would reroute itself and just end up going in such a sporadic zigzag, I would need up needing to sweep up behind it. I wish it would have worked out for us.
customer_reviews.author: Candy H

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This item was a bust. It started out great but after a couple of weeks it has now stopped working properly and we're not sure what the problem is. It starts out and runs for a few minutes then stops and starts beeping, but there is no indication of what is wrong. It can be reset but keeps doing the same thing. Our old roomba worked fine, juust wore out. We won't be buying this type of vacuum again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Collins

customer_reviews.title: Changed My Life!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a slight exaggeration, but not much. I can’t tell I have two cats anymore. Eve is now part of the family. The cats are cautiously warming up to her. Eve does a better job not falling from edge of open stairs than the youngest. He’s impressed as well.
customer_reviews.author: susan norris

customer_reviews.title: What took me so long to buy this?
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying a robotic vacuum for a long time because I thought there would be too many obstacles in my home. I am thrilled with this purchase! I have to do very little to prepare to let the vacuum loose on my home. Even my cats don't mind it. Cleans very well. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum!! I needed one a little thicker than my last one so it wouldn’t get stuck under my radiators. The extra large dustbin is such a plus. I have one dog and two cats and this vacuum does an amazing job of cleaning up the hair. Relatively quiet and runs on schedule. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Eblacker

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike this product. If there is anything on the carpet it will remain there even after the robot vacuum has went over the area. It could be a dust bunny or a small piece of tissue. I am very disappointed in this product. $360 for garbage. I definitely would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Short

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY Shark ION Robot Vacuum R87!!!
customer_reviews.text: So it’s only been a week since I’ve had my Shark ION Robot Vacuum R87 & I love it!!! So far so good. I’ve had to vacuum every day for the first 3 days then after that I just do it every other day...suction is good & my floors are clean!!! Saves me so much time & it makes me look like the perfect home maker 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great except for getting the app on my phone.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it, it's great for a middle of the week cleaning, however i called the techs to help get the app downloaded and they said they'd call back within 48 hours and they did not. Still can't use the app with it after 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: This robot is awesome. It has a stronger suction than some of the other robots. It works great. However, I have not being able to get the remote to work. So I have been using the buttons on top of the robot.
customer_reviews.author: Chancy

customer_reviews.title: Sparky works great
customer_reviews.text: I love my shark or sparky as I call her. She does a fantastic job. I’ve now had my sparky a bit now and still love it. Easy to empty and keep clean. It does fantastic on my carpets and hard wood.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for! Amazing product and price :)
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to get finally robot vacuum :) We bought that one because of reviews and price. I think price is so good compared to others products. Was funny to see how it bumps into walls or other stuff. He does good jog on a rug. That’s make me happy :) Was so easy to start use it! Can’t wait to download app and schedule cleaning :)
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: May have trouble setting up
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a little tricky trying to get it to connect to my WiFi Alexa voice commands don’t always work the Alexa skill for shark definitely needs to be approved on the shark app doesn’t work great either
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Must have 3 foot clearing around charging spot,for shark to find its way back.
customer_reviews.text: We call our shark maddie, and she gets it done in hour and half.she wakes up on her own and goes back on her own to her charge spot. Ready in about 3 hours to do it again.be sure dust collection is cleaned out or she wont do as good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t express how much I love my Shark Ion Robot. I purchased an iRobot a year ago and it has to be the nosiest machine ever. It’s so loud and it would constantly get stuck. My Shark is so quiet that not even my dogs are bothered by it. Cleans my wood floors and area rugs with no problem. I am so happy with my Shark. I recommend this vacuum 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Teresi

customer_reviews.title: The greatest purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest little robot vacumm! My boyfriend and I never like to vacumm, and we also have a cat who's hair gets every where. So I decide to purchase the shark robot. The first time I ran it it picked up sooo much crap! I love it. After a week or so of running it I got all the boundry strips placed where it wont get stuck and now it runs around the house hassle free. If you're debating this, just get it, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money and buy a roomba. I was so exited about this but I’ve been disappointed every time it’s run. It’s either stuck on nothing or sucks up everything and get stuck. Spend the money and buy the roomba brand. Infinitely better all around.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Prather

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know why we waited so long
customer_reviews.text: Hello new life! We have a dog that sheds like crazy. This device does an excellent job. The floors feel clean to our bare feet now. The device is easy to use. Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life easier till it gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: The sensors could be a little better but I love my Shark. The bumbers that come with it move around a little when the shark hits it and it gets stuck kind of a lot but overall happy!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Y

customer_reviews.title: Dusty, my new BFF
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an Amazon return. The box was a little banged up. However, the product itself was prestine! It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2019
customer_reviews.text: By far the best purchase I made in 2019. Every day I come home to lines on the carpet and I smile. Three adults and a dog live in our home. Picks up everything including the ultra fine dust particles. The app is really easy to use. Im not gonna lie, I’m kind of obsessed with my shark. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Pasquinelli

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my world. I have back problems so anytime I can save myself pain is worth it. We have 3 dogs and it picks up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Andry

customer_reviews.title: Hangs up
customer_reviews.text: Goes under bed and goes to sleep and can't find. It will be stuck on things I didn't know was under there.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It does a great job. I don't think that I could live without it . It asked me about the remote. A remote would be nice but if it was supposed to be in the box it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Laminda Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet parents and hardwood!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super easy set up, works with Alexa, great with our pet hair! We love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: chelyn mccain

customer_reviews.title: The best !
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love my Shark. I had a smaller off name brand for 5 years and bought this one on a recommendation. I wish I never bought the other one it’s like apples vs oranges. The Shark is sssooo easy to empty and the xlarge dust bin is the best. I set it up with my phone and can change, skip or stop a scheduled cleaning. Would definately recommend. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Great value said refurbished but came package like new
customer_reviews.text: One of my best investments last year easy to program and forget or turn it on when you need
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kent

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum great, app needs work
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, works like advertised. Great on pet hair and easy to clean. Would have given it 5 stars but the app is lacking. Especially in the map department.
customer_reviews.author: Big JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. App is great. Connected to Alexa very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Shark is great!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Shark. Highly impressed with how much it sucks up. It's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pkidd131

customer_reviews.title: Great Robot Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great, easy to clean, and picks up debris well. Not a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sager

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE , LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how well it sweeps. I have the mopping machine, all I need is a auto DUSTER!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: the shark
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better, quieter stronger just all around better
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this Shark, It cleans well and has good suction.
customer_reviews.author: JMRH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My Sharkie, as we call it, saved my quarantined days!! The only issue I have is I need to be somewhat close to the device to get it to dock, otherwise it’s all amazing!
customer_reviews.author: mariliz23

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: You don’t really have remote control over the vacuum you can stop it and play it those are the only options. Suction power is good my floors are always clean. The vacuum runs foe about an hour or an hour and a half depending.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Browne

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with a great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Can't believe I waited to get this. Works great picking up dog hair. So happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dayton J Delcambre

customer_reviews.title: We have had so much trouble with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We cannot get it to dock, we cannot get it to charge, we have only had if for a month and no longer have the option to return it. We had a Roomba previously and loved it, should have spent the extra money to get a MUCH better product.
customer_reviews.author: chris gay

customer_reviews.title: Day to day
customer_reviews.text: I dig it gets the light day to day done the wife does run her dyson for the deep clean weekly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure its good for your floors
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Quality of the unit nice. Better for shag or indoor out door carpet ,hard wood. My carpets thick.The brain did not go in every room and light carpet looked like a alien maze came through.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It cleans like a pro. Esp under couch and other places that gets dusty easily. Clean my hardwood floors perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Rock

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and off it goes!!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very good including corners and under living room furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sub par
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is a lot less than the older model that we bought from Kohl's the year before. Other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Set it and forget it. Our hard wood floor look polished.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful investment
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. Best money I’ve spent in along time.
customer_reviews.author: Resi Custer

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: the brushes don't spin as fast as my roomba did, it doesn't do that great on carpet, and it rarely finds itself back to it's cradle. But it does do great on tile and wood floors. it doesn't get stuck under the fridge like my roomba did, so that alone makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: km in tx

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made.  But something else.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst most frustrating things I have ever purchased. I bought two for my family. One was DOA right out of the box. The other broke right after amazons return policy. Shark charged me $30 to ship a warranty replacement. It broke in a month and they sent another. That one does not want to dock so they sent a new dock. Just do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of keeping the floors clean. Suction is average, but connecting to the wifi has been my biggest issue. After upgrading my router, it will not connect to my new router. Because of the area that I need it for (1000 sq ft), the battery never dies before cleaning the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Shark Ion R87!!!! It was super easy to assemble. The connection to Alexa was a breeze. I actually think this vacuum cleans more thoroughly than my regular vacuum - it gets into and under places the other vacuum can’t. The larger “dirt box” is a must for folks who have dogs that shed. And last but not least, who would not love being able to sip coffee in the morning and vacuum without leaving the chair.
customer_reviews.author: SuPerStar

customer_reviews.title: Can never find dock station
customer_reviews.text: I had another model prior to this one that I loved and had no issues with it until it ran over some liquids and needed replaced... This one cleans well, but can never get back to it’s charging station, which is super annoying considering we’ve changed nothing about where docking station is or moved any furniture in the home. It can be right in front of the docking station and turn the other way and go get lost somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 "robo vacs" all different brands. This Shark was by far the best. This vac has super strong suction, it has great battery life, easy to clean (the easiest I've had). Its quiet, and it crawls up onto thick rugs!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Dumber than a rock.
customer_reviews.text: Bounces around aimlessly, cleaning the same area several times before running out of battery. Loves to chew up power cords and rugs along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn but Clean Well
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I had a Neato. The neato was much smarter, but I think this shark vacuum does a better overall job cleaning even though it will stubbornly ram its face into stuff over and over. If you can look past it's dim, stubborn approach to work and let it do its thing, it will clean your floors well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Von Bose

customer_reviews.title: It vacuums without me having to do it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Does a great job thru multiple rooms. Doesn’t always find its way back to charger, but I’m okay with that, just pick it up and place on charger myself. It does what I wanted...cleans the floors automatically! Easy set up, no issues so far after using for one week.
customer_reviews.author: bptlage

customer_reviews.title: Good value for smart homes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great little robovac. I previously had bought one from Walmart without any ability to use my Google Assistant. This vacuum is pretty great at responding to me when using that feature. One thing I'm not fond of is the fact it bumps into EVERYTHING. My other vac had excellent collision detection and it feels weird to have one from a brand name with worse but it's the trade off I suppose. Still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Utter garbage.  Overpriced and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back within 1 hour of receiving. What a waste of time ! Unit refuses to nudge from it's docking station. It throws an undecipherable error on the app. Not ready for primetime. Doesn't work and costs too much.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Be Ware the side switch!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the app doesn’t connect very well, but the buttons on the unit make up for it. The power switch on the side of the unit is the only real issue... if you have wall-mounted door stops, they might accidentally flip the switch off... beyond that, great product
customer_reviews.author: Jared Stone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. One less chore!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to vacuum my house. I have few rugs but mostly wood and tiles and it doesn't get stuck. . Large dust pan I clean out after use. Love it one less chore :)
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my 27 year old. He reports he likes it. It has good suction and is not noisy. He hopes it gets smarter and learns his apartment, not sure it ever will. Future models would be better with AI.
customer_reviews.author: NJHal

customer_reviews.title: Sharlene Shark dies what she is advertised to do!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! I will invest next time in one that has technology for navigation, mapping and assignment of rooms via my mobile app. This machine though does a great job if the price is right for your budget. :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping up with dust and dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. We have 2 pug mix dogs that she’d like crazy year round and this really helps keep things manageable. I run it every 2 days. Goes almost an hour on one charge and cleans under furniture very well. Also goes up over our area rugs with no problem at all!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Frost

customer_reviews.title: RV76, Great value robo vac from Shark
customer_reviews.text: This is a good robo vac. I like the features - large dust bin, ease of cleaning the beater bar. Only wish is that it could map my rooms, to permit more frequent cleaning high use areas.
customer_reviews.author: slbroug74

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my shark R87. I thought my house was clean until I ran the robot. The amount of hair & dust it got up was amazing. I love using Alexa to run and dock my robot. I wish I bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 2

customer_reviews.title: Works as description.
customer_reviews.text: Works as description says. Having border scrips keeps robot to vacuum certain room. Note: Robot sits higher then my baseboards. Please measure before choosing what type.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Simon

customer_reviews.title: Hard working little appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and she loves it. Great if you have furry kiddos! I have one myself so I knew how well it works. It arrived in great shape promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little sucker
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning up dog hair, dust, and dirt. My floors and rugs are spotless after it does its thing.
customer_reviews.author: JTGH

customer_reviews.title: The best robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This robot vacuum is AMAZING! My only complaint is that it can never find the doc station when I tap on the “doc” button
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. The receiver said she loves it and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Harris

customer_reviews.title: One less housecleaning chore to do.
customer_reviews.text: This Shark product is easy to use and easy to clean. I love the fact I can start it and forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Benson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it- use it every other day- picks up dog hair with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Christina C. Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dugas

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck too easily.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans well but gets stuck all the time. Never had these issues with the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.C.

product_meta.title: Shark ION Robot Vacuum R87 with Wi-Fi and Voice Control, 0.6 Quarts, in Black
product_meta.description: Style:XL CapacityThe Shark ION Robot is designed with a Tri-Brush System, combining side brushes, channel brushes, and a multi-surface brushroll to handle all debris on surfaces, corners, and edges. With more suction than the original Shark ION Robot and an extra-large dust bin, you get powerful deep cleaning and great debris pickup. Use the SharkClean app or voice control with Alexa or Google Assistant to start cleaning from anywhere.
feature_bullets: THREE BRUSH TYPES. ONE POWERFUL CLEAN: Tri-Brush System combines side brushes, channel brushes, and a multi-surface brushroll to handle debris on all surfaces.
HEIGHTENED SUCTION POWER: More deep-cleaning suction power than the original Shark ION Robot R750.
COMPLETELY INTEGRATED IN YOUR HOME: Shark ION Robot senses ledges and stairs, avoids damaging furniture and walls, and maneuvers around potential stuck situations, truly knowing your home.
CLEAN FROM YOUR PHONE: SharkClean app lets you start and stop cleaning and schedule your robot to clean whenever you want.
EASY VOICE CONTROL: Use Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant to easily make the robot clean at your command in your connected home.
EXTRA-LARGE CAPACITY: With an XL dust bin, you get incredible debris pickup for up to 90 minutes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars476 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
